html: End. I will not always threaten or be angry, Genesis vi. 3. (Calmet) — Spirit. Holy Ghost. (St. Irenæus v. 12.) (St. Augustine) — God spares the humble penitent, and grants what they desire with as much eagerness as a sailor does a fair wind. (Worthington) — He does not regard the indifferent. (Haydock)
